scripts.clean:deep: bunx rimraf node_modules bun.lockb && bun install
scripts.postinstall: if [ "$CI" = "true" ]; then bunx electron-rebuild -w webrtcvad -f; fi
scripts.build: bunx rimraf packages/*/dist && bunx concurrently "bun run --cwd packages/main build" "bun run --cwd packages/preload build" "bun run --cwd packages/renderer build" && cd packages/renderer && bun build ./render-host-script.tsx --outfile ../../render-host-script.js --target browser --external electron --no-typecheck && cd ../..
scripts.dev: bunx concurrently -n main,preload,renderer,hostRenderer,electron "bun run --cwd packages/main build:watch" "bun run --cwd packages/preload dev" "bun run --cwd packages/renderer dev" "cd packages/renderer && bun build ./render-host-script.tsx --outfile ../../render-host-script.js --target browser --external electron --no-typecheck --watch" "wait-on packages/main/dist/main/index.js packages/main/dist/preload/preload.cjs packages/renderer/dist/index.js render-host-script.js && bun run --cwd packages/main start"
scripts.package: bun run build && electron-builder build --config electron-builder.config.js
